item.title: How do i make an npc talk
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if (NPCID == 520) {
sendFrame200(521, 521);//NPC ID
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(519), ####); //NPCID
sendFrame126("", ####);
sendFrame126("First Line of Text ", 4904);
sendFrame126(“Second Line of Text”, 4905);
sendFrame126(“3rd line of Text”, 4906);
sendFrame75(519, 4901);
sendFrame164(4900);
}

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make an npc talk
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Open client.java and add this

under wanneshop

if (NPCID == 519) {
sendFrame200(####, 591);//NPC ID
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(519), ####); //NPCID
sendFrame126("", ####);
sendFrame126("First Line of Text ", 4904);
sendFrame126(“Second Line of Text”, 4905);
sendFrame126(“3rd line of Text”, 4906);
sendFrame75(519, 4901);
sendFrame164(4900);
}

Read full topic
